name: Fire Ring - Humanitys last 10 minutes
description:
Information

In the distant future, humanity is facing an alien invasion.
Take control of a powerful defense ship and fight for the Earth.
Even though the radars say that in 10 minutes the alien flagship will arrive and destroy the planet.

Control
A - move to the left;
D - move to the right;
Spacebar - Shoot;

[S] - after accumulating enough points, you can activate the special skill button on the screen to reset the overheat bar;

Improvements

By destroying alien ships, you get points you can use to improve the parameters of the ship:

  • Rate of fire;
  • Cooling;
  • Accuracy;
  • Speed;

Credits

Planets– https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator
The ships are built with – https://bizmasterstudios.itch.io/spaceship-creation-kit
UI – https://sungraphica.itch.io/sci-fi-game-ui-collection-free-version
Effects – https://wenrexa.itch.io/laser2020
